item.title: 2 Dallas girls killed in flooding at Camp Mystic, families say
item.description: Three girls from Dallas, 8-year-olds Hadley Hanna and Eloise Peck and 9-year-old Lila Bonner, were among the missing Camp Mystic campers.

item.title: U.S. tariffs on European goods threaten consumers on both sides of Atlantic
item.description: EU said it was prepared to retaliate with tariffs on hundreds of American products, from U.S. beef, auto parts and beer to Boeing airplanes.

item.title: Camp Mystic confirms 27 campers and counselors killed in Texas flooding
item.description: Dozens of people have died in the Texas flooding that struck on the Fourth of July.

item.title: 4 clear signs that bankruptcy is your best option now
item.description: Think bankruptcy sounds extreme? These warning signs signal that it might be the best bet for your finances.

item.title: Here's where you can donate to help Central Texas flood recovery
item.description: Several organizations are accepting donations for those impacted by the floods, as well as first responders and volunteers.
